009package FittingCircles;
010
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.gui.NewImage;
015import ij.gui.Overlay;
016import ij.gui.PointRoi;
017import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
018import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.CircleSampler;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
026
027/**
028 * Samples points on a given (ideal) circle and creates a new image with 
029 * the sample points contained in a {@link PointRoi}.
030 * Image size, circle parameters and noise can be specified.
031 * The result can be used as a test image for circle fitting.
032 * 
033 * @author WB
034 *
035 */
036public class Circle_Sample_To_Roi implements PlugIn {
037        
038        private static String title = Circle_Sample_To_Roi.class.getSimpleName();
039        private static int W = 400;
040        private static int H = 400;
041        private static boolean ShowRealCircle = true;
042        
043        private static double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
044        private static BasicAwtColor StrokeColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
045        
046        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
047                
048                @DialogLabel("number of points")
049                public int n = 20;
050                
051                @DialogLabel("circle center (xc)")
052                public double xc = 200;
053                
054                @DialogLabel("circle center (yc)")
055                public double yc = 190;
056                
057                @DialogLabel("circle radius (r)")
058                public double r = 150;
059                
060                @DialogLabel("start angle (deg)")
061                public double angle0 = 0;
062                
063                @DialogLabel("stop angle (deg)")
064                public double angle1 = 180;
065                
066                @DialogLabel("x/y noise (sigma)")
067                public double sigma = 5.0; //2.0;
068        };
069        
070        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
071        
072        @Override
073        public void run(String arg) {
074                if (!runDialog()) {
075                        return;
076                }
077                
078                GeometricCircle realCircle = new GeometricCircle(params.xc, params.yc, params.r);
079                Pnt2d[] points = new CircleSampler(realCircle).getPoints(params.n, 
080                                Math.toRadians(params.angle0), Math.toRadians(params.angle1), params.sigma);
081                PointRoi roi = RoiUtils.toPointRoi(points);
082                
083                ImagePlus im = NewImage.createByteImage(title, W, H, 1, NewImage.FILL_WHITE);  //new ImagePlus(title, ip);
084                im.setRoi(roi);
085                
086                if (ShowRealCircle) {
087                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
088                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
089                        ColoredStroke circleStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, StrokeColor.getColor());
090                        ola.addShapes(realCircle.getShapes(3), circleStroke);
091                        im.setOverlay(oly);
092                }
093                
094                im.show();
095        }
096        
097        // ------------------------------------------
098        
099        private boolean runDialog() {
100                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
101                
102                gd.addStringField("Title", title, 12);
103                gd.addNumericField("image width", W, 0);
104                gd.addNumericField("image height", W, 0);       
105                params.addToDialog(gd);
106                gd.addCheckbox("show real circle", ShowRealCircle);
107                gd.addEnumChoice("circle color", StrokeColor);
108
109                gd.showDialog();
110                if (gd.wasCanceled())
111                        return false;
112                
113                title = gd.getNextString();
114                W = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
115                H = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
116                params.getFromDialog(gd);
117                ShowRealCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
118                StrokeColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
119
120                return params.validate();
121        }
122
123}
